page.title: 19BMX Racing in Redditch.
page.content: BMX is a popular sport.It started in America.In Redditch a special track has been built opposite{Halfords {National Distribution Centre. { There is Freestyling }and {Racing. {Freestyling includes stunts}such as "table tops" where the riders jump and turn flat in the air.There are many other kinds of tricks.When people race they have heats and the winners go forward to the final.They usually do stunts as they go along.There are two kinds of bikes,a{freestyle bike}and a {racing bike}which is lighter.When racing they have to wear a{helmet, {padded trouses and a padded jumper.} They also wear{gloves and special {shoes with grips.} The track is used mainly by boys. It is less used nowadays as it is deteriorating in condition.Some children perform stunts in the road which is{very dangerous.
